text: I Spit on Your Grave is a 2010 American crime horror thriller movie in the rape and revenge genre of movies. It was produced by Lisa M. Hansen, Paul Hertzberg and Meir Zarchi and was directed by Steven R. Monroe. The movie was released on October 8, 2010. The movie is a remake of the 1978 movie, I Spit on Your Grave. The movie received negative reviews with a 37% on Rotten Tomatoes which is rotten and is also rated as a 27% out of 100% by Metacritic. == Cast == *Sarah Butler as Jennifer *Chad Lindberg as Matthew *Daniel Franzese as Stanley *Rodney Eastman as Andy *Jeff Branson as Johnny *Andrew Howard as Storch *Tracey Walter as Earl *Mollie Milligan as Mrs. Storch *Saxon Sharbino as Chastity *Amber Dawn Landrum as Girl at Gas Station == Other websites == *I Spit on Your Grave's Official website * * Category:2010 horror movies Category:2010 crime thriller movies Category:2010s horror thriller movies Category:2010s serial killer movies Category:2010s American crime thriller movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:American movie remakes Category:American serial killer movies Category:2010s English- language movies Category:Movies about revenge Category:Rape in movies Category:2010s feminist movies Category:American independent movies
title: I Spit on Your Grave (2010 movie)
